tiny.comment: The spacing of the tiny Stack object.

small.comment: The spacing of the small Stack object.

medium.comment: The spacing of the medium Stack object.

large.comment: The spacing of the large Stack object.

huge.comment: The spacing of the huge Stack object.

a.comment: The spacing of the Misc A Stack object.

b.comment: The spacing of the Misc B Stack object.

c.comment: The spacing of the Misc C Stack object.

d.comment: The spacing of the Misc D Stack object.

xxs.comment: The breakpoint for Stack objects that split at the extra extra small point.

xs.comment: The breakpoint for Stack objects that split at the extra small point.

s.comment: The breakpoint for Stack objects that split at the small point.

m.comment: The breakpoint for Stack objects that split at the medium point.

l.comment: The breakpoint for Stack objects that split at the large point.

xl.comment: The breakpoint for Stack objects that split at the extra large point.
